/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a palette of mostly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. 

Parked cars line the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the entire scene in a warm, inviting light.
